product_name: Atomic Hawx 90 W Ski Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Designed so you can expand your skills, the intermediate-level women's Atomic Hawx 90 W ski boots offer mid-wide 100mm footbeds that won't crush your feet and flexible shell zones to increase control. Bi-component shells feature specialized flex zones that complement the natural motions of your feet. Located between the first and second buckles, these zones made of soft plastic boost control, ease turns and enhance balance. Each boot liner features differing materials on the left and right; firm material helps you feel the terrain on the inside of the turn and soft material cushions recovery. Women-specific liners feature a unique foam construction that traps air against skin for maximum warmth, and cushioning insoles and cozy faux fur to enhance comfort. Custom-moldable liners mold to ankles and forefeet to increase heel hold. Collars feature 4-way stretch materials that instantly provide up to 10mm of space for the lower calf. Still feeling the pinch? Cuff can be lowered by 10mm and the circumference can be increased by 8mm. Flex index of 90 offers the response preferred by aggressive intermediates. The women's Atomic Hawx 90 W ski boots feature mid-wide 100mm footbeds to balance performance and comfort.
short_description: Designed so you can expand your skills, the intermediate-level women's Atomic Hawx 90 W ski boots offer mid-wide 100mm footbeds that won't crush your feet and flexible shell zones to increase control.
